name: Kleiner Großeinkauf
description:
Kleiner Großeinkauf, which basically means "Little Big Grocerys" in german, is a Colorful Block Puzzle Game. I made this game in 2020 as a christmas present for my girlfriend. The Game doesn't have annoying ads or ingame purchases like the other ones of its kind. You are unlocking new themes with the ingame currency just by playing it. Feel free to watch my Video about this Project here:

THE VIDEO WILL SOON BE RELEASED ON MY CHANNEL

It was originally planned to be a mobile game. But sadly I couldn't figured out how to build it for Android, so I rushed to make a PC Version. I will try to port that game to mobile in 2021. You will find the free download here or in the Google App Store.

Feel free to use the Assets I made for the Game for free! You are even allowed to use it commercially, if you are nice enough to ask.
